item.title: Editing Host file using GasMask on Mac OS X
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: R u using MAC OS X and tired of editing host file entries then Gas Mask is a very good solution for you. Gas Mask is an open source project which can be used as host file manager and it allows switching between the host files. Gas Mask is only available for MAC OS X operating systems. As per the documentation of Gas mask you can run it on the following versions :
